title: Grabphones
short_details: It is an used/pre-owned smartphone selling platform where anyone can easily buy,sell their used smartphones easily. It's a user-friendly platform with cool UI/UX.

see_more.technologies: React.js, Tailwind, DaisyUI, React Router, Node.js, Express.js Firebase, MongoDB, Vercel
see_more.features: 1. Sellers can sell and buyers can buy easily,2. Elegant UI,3. Dashboard Section for Admin

title: Bloom Digital Agency
title2: A freelance digital marketing services providing platform
short_details: It's an freelance digital marketing services providing platform. Anyone can take digital marketing services for their companies. It's a user-friendly platform with great UI/UX

see_more.technologies: React.js, React Router, Tailwind, DaisyUI, Node.js, Firebase, MongoDB, Vercel
see_more.features: 1. Users can hire for digital marketing purposes,2. Stylish UI,3. Review Section for Users

title: Web Dev-Course Arena
title2: A web development courses learning platform.
short_details: It is an web development courses learning platform. Anyone can easily buy courses from here to learn web development.

see_more.technologies: React.js, React Router, Tailwind, DaisyUI, Node.js, Firebase, Vercel
see_more.features: 1. Users can purchase courses,2. Polished UI,3. Authentication with Firebase
